text:
Hey HubDB users!

For those of you were were enrolled in this _Preview draft HubDB rows as dynamic pages BETA_, you might have noticed the "preview" button has been replaced by an "Edit" button, that brings you to a new form + preview based editor for HubDB rows, for tables set up with dynamic pages.

If anyone is interested in giving this editor a try, please feel free to get in touch. It is currently in a private BETA, and we are actively looking for feedback on this new editing model!
